taskDefinition.name: Salesforce Opportunity Create
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a Salesforce Opportunity record with the given parameters and returns the id of the new Opportunity record. The parameters are mapped directly to their respective fields.

parameter.label: Opportunity Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Opportunity Name field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Close Date
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Close Date field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Stage
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Stage field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Private
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Private field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Type field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Lead Source
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Lead Source field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Amount
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Amount field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Next Step
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Next Step field of the Opportunity record

parameter.label: Probability
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Probability field of the Opportunity record
